author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
In today's video I’ll show you the right way to tile a shower using the materials I trust for a professional shower tile install, so you can avoid expensive mistakes and get a fully waterproof, leak-proof finish that lasts. If you found this video helpful, please subscribe. Watch all of the videos from the new project 👉🏼https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL34cQkzKfXWbw0cvItwuNkLOpdJF7gu18

title: The RIGHT Way to Tile a Shower (Avoid Expensive Mistakes!)
